headline: Autodesk shares gain following deal with activist Starboard
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of Autodesk gained 2.5% on Thursday after the company and activist investor Starboard Value reached a deal to place two new independent directors on the board. Starboard had initially pushed for three board seats.

raw.headline: Autodesk shares gain following deal with activist Starboard
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Shares of Autodesk gained 2.5% on Thursday after the company and activist investor Starboard Value reached a deal to place two new independent directors on the board. Starboard had initially pushed for three board seats.

headline: Autodesk settles fight with Starboard, adds two to board
summary: (Reuters) -Autodesk said on Thursday it will add two newcomers to its board and settle one of the year's most high-profile proxy fights after activist hedge fund Starboard Value mounted a boardroom challenge at the software-design company last month.  Jeff Epstein, an operating partner at Bessemer Venture Partners who has served as chief financial officer at several public and private companies, and Christie Simons, who has expertise in auditing tech, media and telecommunications companies and sits on the board of Micron Technology, will join Autodesk's 12-member board, the company said.  The company said the two new directors bring expertise in financial operations, public board service and a deep understanding of the technology companies which will be useful to Autodesk as it executes its industry cloud, platform and artificial intelligence strategies.

raw.headline: Autodesk settles fight with Starboard, adds two to board

Jeff Epstein, an operating partner at Bessemer Venture Partners who has served as chief financial officer at several public and private companies, and Christie Simons, who has expertise in auditing tech, media and telecommunications companies and sits on the board of Micron Technology, will join Autodesk's 12-member board, the company said. headline: Autodesk announces appointment of two independent directors
summary: Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADSK) today announced that it will appoint Jeff Epstein and Christie Simons to its Board of Directors (the "Board") in connection with a cooperation agreement with Starboard Value LP ("Starboard"). Epstein and Simons will serve as non-voting observers on the Board until Autodesk's 2025 Annual Meeting of Stockholders on June 18, 2025 (the "Annual Meeting"), at which point they will become full voting members upon their appointment to the Board. Following the Annual Meeting
